Articles.Content:
So i got the game. me and my friend play it all the time, we love it. anyone else play?

If so, defuser or expert?
Oh wow, this game looks like fun
It's a lot of fun but extremely hard if you dont have your bomb manual extremely organized, (the expert is the only one who can see it)
I brought it in to work to use as a team building exercise. I also play it at home with my wife. My 4 year old likes to play, too, but only as the defuser.
it is good for team building, lol i got it yesterday, my friend and I played it for 2 hours straight, and several times told eachother to just die because we had no idea how to solve it.
Sounds like a good addition to quelf night.
